skin.name: Unit Frames Skin
skin.hint: Select one of available skins for Unit Frames. Client-side setting only.

filter.name: Unit Frames Filter
filter.hint: Select one of available Filters for Unit Frames. Filters change the way Unit Frames look. Client-side setting.

showResourceValues.name: Show Resource Values
showResourceValues.hint: Check this to display resource values on Unit Frame bars for all players.

resetUnitFrames.name: Reset Unit Frames Position
resetUnitFrames.hint: Check this to reset position of Unit Frames to default. Use this if you moved Unit Frames into position where you cannot move it anymore.
